history.proof: intros. unfold ex_pseries in *. qsimpl. qsimpl use: is_pseries_plus. qsimpl use: is_pseries_plus,PSeries_correct. qsimpl use: is_pseries_plus,PSeries_correct. hfcrush depth: 3.

exceptions.tactic: intros K V b a x H1 H2.
intros K' V b a x H1 H2.
intros K' V' b a x H1 H2.
intros K' V' b' a x H1 H2.
intros K' V' b' a' x H1 H2.
intros K' V' b' a' x' H1 H2.

exceptions.exn: Unable to find an instance for the variable x.

In environment K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K a, b : nat -> V x : K x0 : V H1 : is_series (fun k : nat => scal (pow_n x k) (b k)) x0 x1 : V H0 : is_series (fun k : nat => scal (pow_n x k) (a k)) x1 Unable to unify "forall P : V -> Prop, locally (plus ?M2713 ?M2714) P -> filtermap (sum_n (fun k : nat => scal (pow_n ?M2712 k) (PS_plus ?M2710 ?M2711 k))) eventually P" with "exists l : V, is_series (fun k : nat => scal (pow_n x k) (PS_plus a b k)) l".

In environment K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K H : forall (a b : nat -> V) (x : K) (la lb : V), is_pseries a x la -> is_pseries b x lb -> is_pseries (PS_plus a b) x (plus la lb) a, b : nat -> V x : K x0 : V H1 : is_series (fun k : nat => scal (pow_n x k) (b k)) x0 x1 : V H0 : is_series (fun k : nat => scal (pow_n x k) (a k)) x1 Unable to unify "forall P : R_NormedModule -> Prop, locally (PSeries ?M3100 ?M3101) P -> filtermap (sum_n (fun k : nat => scal (pow_n ?M3101 k) (?M3100 k))) eventually P" with "exists l : V, is_series (fun k : nat => scal (pow_n x k) (PS_plus a b k)) l".

In environment H3 : forall (a : nat -> R) (x : R), ex_pseries a x -> is_pseries a x (PSeries a x) K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K H2 : forall (a b : nat -> V) (x : K) (la lb : V), is_pseries a x la -> is_pseries b x lb -> is_pseries (PS_plus a b) x (plus la lb) a, b : nat -> V x : K x0 : V H1 : is_series (fun k : nat => scal (pow_n x k) (b k)) x0 x1 : V H0 : is_series (fun k : nat => scal (pow_n x k) (a k)) x1 Unable to unify "forall P : V -> Prop, locally (plus ?M3565 ?M3566) P -> filtermap (sum_n (fun k : nat => scal (pow_n ?M3564 k) (PS_plus ?M3562 ?M3563 k))) eventually P" with "exists l : V, is_series (fun k : nat => scal (pow_n x k) (PS_plus a b k)) l".

original: intros K V b a x H1 H2. unfold ex_pseries in *. intros [la Hla] [lb Hlb]. split. - apply is_pseries_plus; auto. - apply PSeries_correct. apply is_pseries_plus; auto.
